item.description:
Hey Guys and Gals!

In the area for the holidays? Come out and play some fun Ultimate Frisbee with us!

Some special rules for this game. The game is only on if we get at least 10 RSVPs. So RSVP right now!

Instead of a night game, it will be during the DAYTIME. 1 PM!

Also we are playing at RUSSELL Field. Those of you who have been with us for awhile will remember this field as the majestic turf field by Alewife. For those of you that haven't... well... it's a great turf field right by the Alewife T stop on the Red Line!

Hope to see you there.

Oliver and Joe
item.how_to_find_us: Find the frisbees flying around in the air, and you will find us
item.name: Christmas 2009 Daytime Frisbee @Russell Field!
